titles.title: Impaired Driving Study Act of 2021
To direct the Administrator of the National Highway Traffic Safety Administration to conduct a study on motor vehicle safety and impaired driving, and for other purposes.
Impaired Driving Study Act of 2021

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

bill.summary:
Impaired Driving Study Act of 2021
This bill directs the National Highway Traffic Safety Administration to conduct a study to improve motor vehicle safety and address impaired driving, including alcohol, marijuana, and opioid-impaired driving.
